name: FORTU WEALTH LTD
description: Provider of digital private banking services intended to design a borderless, private and personal finance remedy. The company provides financing options for high-net-worth individuals and businesses requiring secure, reliable and international financial reach by offering multicurrency payment accounts with easy access to financial services, enabling HNIs and customers to enjoy financial freedom and gain complete control over their finances.
one_liner: Provider of digital private banking services intended to design a borderless, private and personal finance remedy. The company provides financing options for high-net-worth individuals and businesses requiring secure, reliable and international financial reach by offering multicurrency payment accounts with easy access to financial services, enabling HNIs and customers to enjoy financial freedom and gain complete control over their finances.
